TopicTitle: Alas poor legoclone, I knew him well.

Articles.Content:
So I saw legoclone got banned sadly, he was a cool guy... Wonder what happened. Let us have a second of silence for him.

(If the mods seem it's necessary, delete this thread at a moments notice, no hard feelings. )

We don't usually discuss bans with anyone but the member involved, but this is only temporary until he can satisfy COPPA requirements, ie: provide parental consent for Squad to store his information (name, email that kind of stuff) on their server.

He'll be back, don't worry

Also, closing.
